originalText.text: I saw Dr. Schaefer yesterday and his NYU location and wanted to share my experience. He is very knowledgeable and has excellent communication skills. I felt at ease speaking with him and he was very patient and kind, he took his time answering and explaining everything. This is a cardiologist I would  recommend.

I felt at ease speaking with him and he was very patient and kind, he took his time answering and explaining everything. This is a cardiologist I would  recommend.

originalText.text: Dr. Schaefer really knows what he's about.  Very thorough and a good listener.  So far I find him to be the best cardiologist I've been to. So glad to be under his care. I continue to be impressed by the doctors at Langone.

text.text: Dr. Schaefer really knows what he's about.  Very thorough and a good listener.  So far I find him to be the best cardiologist I've been to. So glad to be under his care. I continue to be impressed by the doctors at Langone.

originalText.text: Dr. Schaefer is amazing. He is so thorough and knowledgeable. He really takes the time to listen and explains things into detail, in the most articulate and comprehensible way.

text.text: Dr. Schaefer is amazing. He is so thorough and knowledgeable. He really takes the time to listen and explains things into detail, in the most articulate and comprehensible way.

originalText.text: I have unfortunately seen dozens of doctors and all feel the medicine. This is one of the best doctors I have encountered. Great bedside manner. Takes his time and most importantly listens. Examines patient, who he treats like a person, through a holistic lens and places great emphasis on diet, exercise and stress, while also appreciating factors such as genetics, smoking and stress
